intro: Mnesithea laevis var. cochinchinensis, commonly known as the smooth mnesithea, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Araceae and is characterized by its broad, smooth, heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces striking inflorescences with a spadix surrounded by a colorful spathe. It thrives in humid, shady environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in some botanical gardens and private collections.
